
=head1 NAME

dataset_organization

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 dataset_id (integer) - 
 organization_id (integer) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                       Table "gcis_metadata.dataset_organization"
      Column      |  Type   |                             Modifiers                             | Storage | Description 
 -----------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+---------+-------------
  id              | integer | not null default nextval('dataset_organization_id_seq'::regclass) | plain   | 
  dataset_id      | integer |                                                                   | plain   | 
  organization_id | integer |                                                                   | plain   | 
 Indexes:
     "dataset_organization_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "dataset_organization_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (dataset_id) REFERENCES dataset(id) MATCH FULL
     "dataset_organization_ibfk_2" FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES organization(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
